summary: The document comprises forms and reports from the HSCA's investigation into the JFK assassination, focusing on Lee Harvey Oswald's employment at the William B. Reilly Coffee Co. and his association with Juanita Brown, who worked in the payroll department. Brown recalls seeing Oswald in Adrian Alba's garage but had no direct interaction with him. This document, unclassified and last reviewed in 1993, sheds light on Oswald's activities post his return from Russia.
key_findings: Juanita Brown worked at the William B. Reilly Coffee Co. at the same time as Lee Harvey Oswald.
Brown recalls seeing Oswald in Adrian Alba's garage but had no direct interaction with him.
The document is part of the HSCA's investigation into Oswald's activities and associations post his return from Russia.
The document is unclassified and was last reviewed in 1993.
